title: Regional Field CTO
body:
Regional Field CTO / Founding Engineer (Europe)


💰 SALARY: $150,000 - $220,000+ (B2B)

🌍 LOCATION: Remote (within any major European city)

🤝 EQUITY: Yes, significant stock options


About Our Client

We are exclusively representing one of Europe's most exciting AI startups. 🚀 Our client is revolutionizing enterprise customer support by combining cutting-edge AI agents with deep local market expertise.

They've just closed a record-breaking $34M pre-seed round from giants like Index Ventures, Bessemer Venture Partners, and Vine Ventures. They are in hyper-growth mode across Europe, with live enterprise customers in telecom, banking, and healthcare. This is a genuine 0-to-1 opportunity to write the playbook for a brand-new category.


About the Role

Our client is searching for a hands-on technical leader to build their regional technical organization from the ground up.

This is NOT a traditional, hands-off executive CTO role. Think 'Founding Engineer' energy combined with senior leadership experience. You'll be the technical face of the company in your region, splitting your time between leading technical sales, owning complex integrations, and building your high-performing team of 5-10 engineers.


Your Key Responsibilities:

  • 🤝 Technical Sales Leadership: Lead demos, architecture reviews, and security discussions with enterprise clients.

  • 💻 Hands-On Engineering: Ship code, build integrations, and maintain high engineering standards. You'll be deep in the codebase.

  • 📈 Team Building: Recruit, mentor, and lead a top-tier technical team (engineers, integration specialists).

  • 🛠️ Customer Success: Own end-to-end integration and deployment of our AI agents for major clients.

  • 🌍 Product Localization: Gather regional feedback and collaborate with global R&D/Product teams at HQ.

  • 🗣️ Regional Technical Authority: Serve as the go-to technical point of contact for customers, partners, and escalations.


Must-Have Requirements:

  • ✅ 7-8+ years of hands-on software engineering experience with shipped products.

  • 🤖 Deep GenAI/AI Agents Experience: You've built or worked extensively with AI agents.

  • 🗣️ Customer-Facing Pro: Proven background in roles like Field CTO, Solutions Architect, or Deployed Engineer.

  • 💼 Pre-Sales / Solution Architecture: Track record of leading complex technical implementations and enterprise sales discussions.

  • 🚀 Leadership & Startup DNA: Experience at a Director/VP level OR as a startup founder/co-founder. You thrive in ambiguity and move fast.

  • 🌐 Excellent Communication: Fluent English + at least one other major European language.


The Ideal Candidate:

  • Founders, founding engineers, or staff-level engineers who want to build, not just manage.

  • People who get energized by customer conversations and closing deals fast.

  • Leaders who want to own outcomes and operate with a high degree of autonomy.

  • A "0-to-1" mindset—you're here to build from scratch, not maintain.


What Our Client Offers:

  • 💸 Top-Tier Compensation: A highly competitive salary (top of the market).

  • 📈 Significant Equity: Meaningful stock options with a country-specific vesting structure.

  • 🏡 Fully Remote: Work from any major European city (must be able to travel for client demos/meetings).

  • 🌴 Benefits & PTO: A comprehensive package specific to your country.

  • 🚀 Founder-Level Impact: A rare chance to build a team, close deals, and ship code at a rocket ship company with serious backing and real revenue.


Hiring Process:

  1. Initial Screening via Google Meet (with our agency)

  2. Interview with the Internal Team

  3. VP of R&D or Field CTO Interview

  4. Final Interview with the Global CTO
informationClause: Informujemy, że administratorem danych jest Yard Corporate z siedzibą w Warszawie, ul. Sienna 75 (dalej jako "administrator"). Masz prawo do żądania dostępu do swoich danych osobowych, ich sprostowania, usunięcia lub ograniczenia przetwarzania, prawo do wniesienia sprzeciwu wobec przetwarzania, a także prawo do przenoszenia danych oraz wniesienia skargi do organu nadzorczego. Dane osobowe przetwarzane będą w celu realizacji procesu rekrutacji. Podanie danych w zakresie wynikającym z ustawy z dnia 26 czerwca 1974 r. Kodeks pracy jest obowiązkowe. W pozostałym zakresie podanie danych jest dobrowolne. Odmowa podania danych obowiązkowych może skutkować brakiem możliwości przeprowadzenia procesu rekrutacji. Administrator przetwarza dane obowiązkowe na podstawie ciążącego na nim obowiązku prawnego, zaś w zakresie danych dodatkowych podstawą przetwarzania jest zgoda. Dane osobowe będą przetwarzane do czasu zakończenia postępowania rekrutacyjnego i przez okres możliwości dochodzenia ewentualnych roszczeń, a w przypadku wyrażenia zgody na udział w przyszłych postępowaniach rekrutacyjnych - do czasu wycofania tej zgody. Zgoda na przetwarzanie danych osobowych może zostać wycofana w dowolnym momencie. Odbiorcą danych jest serwis Just Join IT oraz inne podmioty, którym powierzyliśmy przetwarzanie danych w związku z rekrutacją.
